nodes.text: Redros was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto and a swoop racer for the Black Vulkars on Taris as of 3956 BBY. He was considered to be the best swoop racer that the Vulkars had to offer. When Revan won the Tarisian Season Opener on Taris, Brejik declared that Revan had cheated and ordered his men to kill everyone. In the ensuing fight Brejik, Redros, and many other Black Vulkars were killed by Revan and the Jedi, Bastila Shan.
